text: Sano kwa achina Samuda (twantumisye) nnongo n’jao (jwali) Swaleh. Jwalakwe jwatite: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Mun’galagatilani Allah, nganinkola ŵanganyammwe nnungu jwine jwangaŵaga Jwalakwe, Jwalakwe ni juŵan’gumbile jenumanja kuumila mwitaka, ni kuntamika palakwepo, basi mum’bendagani chikululuko kaneko ni kutenda toba Kukwakwe, chisimu Ambuje ŵangu ali pakuŵandika (ni umanyilisi Wakwe), Ŵakwanga (maduwa)
